item.title: Related Resources
item.description: Useful Links GitHub Repository for OSCAL NIST Computer Security Resource Center: OSCAL Videos and Presentations NIST OSCAL Workshop - November 5, 2019 Security Automation Simplified via NIST OSCAL: We’re Not in Kansas Anymore Docker Government Summit 2018: Automating Security and Compliance via a New Standard of Standards News FedRAMP Looks to NIST for Security Control Refinements Automating Compliance for Highly Regulated Industries with Docker Enterprise Edition and OSCAL Federal Business Council Presentation What’s Next for FedRAMP?
